knimeNode.name: TableRow To Variable
knimeNode.shortDescription: Defines new flow variables based on row of input table and applies it to a ordinary table connection.

fullDescription.intro: This node uses a single row of a data table to define new flow variables. The names of the variables are defined by the column names and the variable assignments (i.e. the values) are given by the values in the row. The variables are merged into the table flow, which is passed-through this node.

ports.dataIn: Port object being passed on to output port.
The table whose first(!) row will constitute variables' values.
ports.dataOut: The unaltered input table (first input port), whereby the connection carries the variables as defined in second input port.
